channel.title: Looking for 317 PI Coder
channel.description:
I have a website, and a VPS. All I am looking for to start my community is a programmer that can code in-game so that we can drop our server. I need someone who can program almost every aspect of PI, like add minigames, and stuff like that. If you are interested in joining my project PM me or
skype - rick.wellis msn- chrisrox6@hotmail.com
I have a very nice website with a full forums, and pretty much a base PI. Looking for someone who can make it a nice source so we can put it online! Like add minigames, areas, maps, chars, items, things that like.

item.title: Looking for 317 PI Coder
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

If you are trying to accomplish the task of owning your own server, I suggest you fix your English grammar first.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 317 PI Coder
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“syndromeex, post:1, topic:453545”]I have a website, and a VPS. All I am looking for to start my community is a programmer that can code in-game so that we can drop our server. I need someone who can program almost every aspect of PI, like add minigames, and stuff like that. If you are interested in joining my project PM me or

skype - rick.wellis
msn- chrisrox6@hotmail.com

I have a very nice website with a full forums, and pretty much a base PI. Looking for someone who can make it a nice source so we can put it online! Like add minigames, areas, maps, chars, items, things that like.[/quote]
Well first of all this isn’t the right section to request a coder. There is a board called server development and there is a sub-board called development teams. Second I suggest you learn to code yourself. That way you will enjoy your server a lot more.

Read full topic
